verses.verse: וַיְשִׁבֵנִי֮ <S%H7725><s%> Afterward he brought me again אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door הַבַּיִת֒ <S%H1004><s%> of the house וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> and behold waters יֹצְאִ֗ים <S%H3318><s%> issued out מִתַּ֨חַת <S%H8478><s%> under מִפְתַּ֤ן <S%H4670><s%> from under the threshold הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house קָדִ֔ימָה <S%H6921><s%> eastward כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> for the forefront הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> [stood toward] the east וְהַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> and the waters יֹרְדִ֗ים <S%H3381><s%> came down מִתַּ֜חַת <S%H8478><s%> under מִכֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> side הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הַיְמָנִ֔ית <S%H3233><s%> from under from the right מִנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> at the south לַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> [side] of the altar

וַיּוֹצִאֵנִי֮ <S%H3318><s%> Then brought he me out דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> of the way שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> of the gate צָפוֹנָה֒ <S%H6828><s%> northward וַיְסִבֵּ֙נִי֙ <S%H5437><s%> and led me about דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way ח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without unto the utter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַח֔וּץ <S%H2351><s%> to the outer דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> that looketh קָדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> eastward וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters מְפַכִּ֔ים <S%H6349><s%> unstable מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַכָּתֵ֖ף <S%H3802><s%> side הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <S%H3233><s%> on the right

בְּצֵאת־ <S%H3318><s%> went forth הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And when the man קָדִ֖ים <S%H6921><s%> eastward וְקָ֣ו <S%H6957><s%> that had the line בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וַיָּ֤מָד <S%H4058><s%> he measured אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> a thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <S%H520><s%> cubits וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֥נִי <S%H5674><s%> and he brought me through בַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> the waters אָפְסָֽיִם׃ <S%H657><s%> [were] to the ankles

וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> Again he measured אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֥נִי <S%H5674><s%> and brought me through בַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters בִּרְכָּ֑יִם <S%H1290><s%> [were] to the knees וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> Again he measured אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֖נִי <S%H5674><s%> and brought me through מֵ֥י <S%H4325><s%> the waters מָתְנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4975><s%> [were] to the loins

וַיָּ֣מָד <S%H4058><s%> Afterward he measured אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand נַ֕חַל <S%H5158><s%> [and it was] a river אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אוּכַ֖ל <S%H3201><s%> that I could לַעֲבֹ֑ר <S%H5674><s%> not pass over כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָא֤וּ <S%H1342><s%> were risen הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> for the waters מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> waters שָׂ֔חוּ <S%H7813><s%> to swim in נַ֖חַל <S%H5158><s%> a river אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> could יֵעָבֵֽר׃ <S%H5674><s%> that could not be passed over

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> have you הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <S%H7200><s%> hast thou seen בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> unto me Son אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of man וַיּוֹלִכֵ֥נִי <S%H1980><s%> he וַיְשִׁבֵ֖נִי <S%H7725><s%> me and caused me to return שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> to the brink הַנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> of the river

בְּשׁוּבֵ֕נִי <S%H7725><s%> Now when I had returned וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> behold אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> behold at the bank הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> trees רַ֣ב <S%H7227><s%> many מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> [were] very מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> the one וּמִזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> side

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> toward הַמַּ֤יִם <S%H4325><s%> he unto me These waters הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> These יוֹצְאִ֗ים <S%H3318><s%> issue out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַגְּלִילָה֙ <S%H1552><s%> country הַקַּדְמוֹנָ֔ה <S%H6930><s%> toward the east וְיָרְד֖וּ <S%H3381><s%> and go down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <S%H6160><s%> into the desert וּבָ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and go הַיָּ֔מָּה <S%H3220><s%> into the sea אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward הַיָּ֥מָּה <S%H3220><s%> into the sea הַמּֽוּצָאִ֖ים <S%H3318><s%> [which being] brought forth [וְנִרְפְּאוּ כ] (וְנִרְפּ֥וּ <S%H7495><s%> cure ק) הַמָּֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> the waters

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will come כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] every thing חַיָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2416><s%> that liveth אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִשְׁרֹ֡ץ <S%H8317><s%> which moveth אֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> in כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which יָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall come שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there נַחֲלַ֙יִם֙ <S%H5158><s%> whithersoever the rivers יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <S%H2421><s%> shall live וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will come הַדָּגָ֖ה <S%H1710><s%> multitude of fish רַבָּ֣ה <S%H7227><s%> great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and there shall be a very כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> shall come שָׁ֜מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there הַמַּ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> because these waters הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וְיֵרָֽפְאוּ֙ <S%H7495><s%> thither for they shall be healed וָחָ֔י <S%H2425><s%> and every thing shall live כֹּ֛ל <S%H3605><s%> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יָ֥בוֹא <S%H935><s%> cometh שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there הַנָּֽחַל׃ <S%H5158><s%> whither the river

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> will come [יַעַמְדוּ כ] (עָמְד֨וּ <S%H5975><s%> abide ק) עָלָ֜יו <S%H5921><s%> beside דַּוָּגִ֗ים <S%H1728><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] the fishers מֵעֵ֥ין גֶּ֙דִי֙ <S%H5872><s%> upon it from Engedi וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against עֵ֣ין עֶגְלַ֔יִם <S%H5882><s%> even unto Eneglaim מִשְׁט֥וֹחַ <S%H4894><s%> they shall be a [place] to spread forth לַֽחֲרָמִ֖ים <S%H2764><s%> nets יִהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> will come לְמִינָה֙ <S%H4327><s%> shall be according to their kinds תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> will come דְגָתָ֔ם <S%H1710><s%> their fish כִּדְגַ֛ת <S%H1710><s%> as the fish הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the great רַבָּ֥ה <S%H7227><s%> many מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> exceeding

[בִּצֹּאתֹו כ] (בִּצֹּאתָ֧יו <S%H1207><s%> swamp ק) וּגְבָאָ֛יו <S%H1360><s%> thereof and the marishes וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> will not יֵרָפְא֖וּ <S%H7495><s%> thereof shall not be healed לְמֶ֥לַח <S%H4417><s%> to salt נִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H5414><s%> they shall be given

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> By הַנַּ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> And by the river יַעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> thereof on this side and on that side shall grow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on שְׂפָת֣וֹ <S%H8193><s%> upon the bank מִזֶּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> one וּמִזֶּ֣ה ׀ <S%H2088><s%> side כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵֽץ־ <S%H6086><s%> all trees מַ֠אֲכָל <S%H3978><s%> for meat לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִבּ֨וֹל <S%H5034><s%> shall not fade עָלֵ֜הוּ <S%H5929><s%> whose leaf וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִתֹּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> thereof be consumed פִּרְי֗וֹ <S%H6529><s%> neither shall the fruit לָֽחֳדָשָׁיו֙ <S%H2320><s%> according to his months יְבַכֵּ֔ר <S%H1069><s%> it shall bring forth new fruit כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because מֵימָ֔יו <S%H4325><s%> because their waters מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <S%H4720><s%> of the sanctuary הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יֽוֹצְאִ֑ים <S%H3318><s%> they issued out [וְהָיוּ כ] (וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become ק) פִרְיוֹ֙ <S%H6529><s%> and the fruit לְמַֽאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> thereof shall be for meat וְעָלֵ֖הוּ <S%H5929><s%> and the leaf לִתְרוּפָֽה׃ <S%H8644><s%> thereof for medicine ס

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD גֵּ֤ה <S%H1454><s%> This גְבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> [shall be] the border אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תִּתְנַחֲל֣וּ <S%H5157><s%> whereby ye shall inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land לִשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> two עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> ten שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> Joseph חֲבָלִֽים׃ <S%H2256><s%> [shall have two] portions

וּנְחַלְתֶּ֤ם <S%H5157><s%> And ye shall inherit אוֹתָהּ֙ <S%H853><s%> אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> it one כְּאָחִ֔יו <S%H251><s%> as well as another אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <S%H5375><s%> [concerning] the which I lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> mine hand לְתִתָּ֖הּ <S%H5414><s%> to give לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> it unto your fathers וְנָ֨פְלָ֜ה <S%H5307><s%> shall fall הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָכֶ֖ם בְּנַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> unto you for inheritance

וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> This גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> And this [shall be] the border הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land לִפְאַ֨ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפ֜וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> toward the north מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַיָּ֧ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> from the great הַדֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way חֶתְלֹ֖ן <S%H2855><s%> of Hethlon לְב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> as men go צְדָֽדָה׃ <S%H6657><s%> to Zedad

חֲמָ֤ת ׀ <S%H2574><s%> Hamath בֵּר֙וֹתָה֙ <S%H1268><s%> Berothah סִבְרַ֔יִם <S%H5453><s%> Sibraim אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> is between גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> which [is] between the border דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus וּבֵ֖ין <S%H996><s%> is between גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath חָצֵר֙ הַתִּיכ֔וֹן <S%H2694><s%> Hazarhatticon אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> which [is] by the coast חַוְרָֽן׃ <S%H2362><s%> of Hauran

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> shall extend גְב֜וּל <S%H1366><s%> And the border מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַיָּ֗ם <S%H3220><s%> from the sea חֲצַ֤ר עֵינוֹן֙ <S%H2703><s%> shall be Hazarenan גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> the border דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus וְצָפ֥וֹן ׀ <S%H6828><s%> and the north צָפ֖וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> northward וּגְב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side צָפֽוֹן׃ <S%H6828><s%> And [this is] the north

וּפְאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִ֡ים <S%H6921><s%> And the east מִבֵּ֣ין <S%H996><s%> from חַוְרָ֣ן <S%H2362><s%> Hauran וּמִבֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> and from דַּמֶּשֶׂק֩ <S%H1834><s%> Damascus וּמִבֵּ֨ין <S%H996><s%> and from הַגִּלְעָ֜ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וּמִבֵּ֨ין <S%H996><s%> and from אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> [by] Jordan מִגְּב֛וּל <S%H1366><s%> from the border עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַיָּ֥ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֖י <S%H6931><s%> unto the east תָּמֹ֑דּוּ <S%H4058><s%> ye shall measure וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> פְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> side קָדִֽימָה׃ <S%H6921><s%> And [this is] the east

וּפְאַת֙ <S%H6285><s%> side נֶ֣גֶב <S%H5045><s%> And the south תֵּימָ֔נָה <S%H8486><s%> southward מִתָּמָ֗ר <S%H8559><s%> from Tamar עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far מֵי֙ <S%H4325><s%> [even] to the waters מְרִיב֣וֹת <S%H4808><s%> provocation קָדֵ֔שׁ <S%H6946><s%> [in] Kadesh נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5158><s%> the river אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> to the great וְאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side תֵּימָ֖נָה <S%H8486><s%> And [this is] the south נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <S%H5045><s%> southward

וּפְאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָם֙ <S%H3220><s%> The west הַיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> sea הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> also [shall be] the great מִגְּב֕וּל <S%H1366><s%> from the border עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to a point נֹ֖כַח <S%H5227><s%> over against לְב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> till a man come חֲמָ֑ת <S%H2574><s%> Hamath זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise פְּאַת־ <S%H6285><s%> side יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> This [is] the west

וְחִלַּקְתֶּ֞ם <S%H2505><s%> So shall ye divide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָכֶ֖ם לְשִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> unto you according to the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become תַּפִּ֣לוּ <S%H5307><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] ye shall divide אוֹתָהּ֮ <S%H853><s%> בְּנַחֲלָה֒ <S%H5159><s%> it by lot for an inheritance לָכֶ֗ם וּלְהַגֵּרִים֙ <S%H1616><s%> unto you and to the strangers הַגָּרִ֣ים <S%H1481><s%> that sojourn בְּתוֹכְכֶ֔ם <S%H8432><s%> among אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הוֹלִ֥דוּ <S%H3205><s%> you which shall beget בָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> children בְּתֽוֹכְכֶ֑ם <S%H8432><s%> among וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֗ם כְּאֶזְרָח֙ <S%H249><s%> you and they shall be unto you as born בִּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִתְּכֶם֙ <S%H854><s%> by יִפְּל֣וּ <S%H5307><s%> they shall have בְנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> with you among שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בַשֵּׁ֔בֶט <S%H7626><s%> And it shall come to pass [that] in what tribe אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which גָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> sojourneth הַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> the stranger אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for שָׁ֚ם <S%H8033><s%> there תִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> there shall ye give נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> [him] his inheritance נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> GOD ס
